name: redux-most
description: Most.js based middleware for Redux. Handle async actions with monadic streams and reactive programming.

scripts.check: yarn run lint && yarn run test
scripts.build:cjs: rimraf lib && cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --out-dir lib
scripts.build:es: rimraf es && cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir es
scripts.build:umd:dev:rollup: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/redux-most.js
scripts.build:umd:prod:rollup: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/redux-most.min.js
scripts.build:umd:rollup: rimraf dist && yarn run build:umd:dev:rollup && yarn run build:umd:prod:rollup
scripts.build:rollup: yarn run build:cjs && yarn run build:es && yarn run build:umd:rollup
scripts.build:umd:dev:webpack: cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs webpack src/index.js dist/redux-most.js --config webpack.config.dev.babel.js
scripts.build:umd:prod:webpack: cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs webpack src/index.js dist/redux-most.min.js --config webpack.config.prod.babel.js
scripts.build:umd:webpack: rimraf dist && yarn run build:umd:dev:webpack && yarn run build:umd:prod:webpack
scripts.build:webpack: yarn run build:cjs && yarn run build:es && yarn run build:umd:webpack
scripts.prepublish: yarn run lint && yarn run build
